content:
Along with Feynman's theory of Feynman diagrams, Penrose's theory of spin networks was one of the big motivations for taking string diagrams seriously in category theory. A lot of Penrose's first papers on this subject are hard to get, so I've made them all available here:

  • Penrose on spin networks.

Just yesterday I found John Mousorris' thesis online, and added it to this page. He was a student of Penrose who wrote a nice thesis on spin networks.
